backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing animation, audio, and UI control features with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH-themed CSS variables and dark mode overrides for global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling form input, surprise view display, animation replay, and mute control.
frontend/src/components/TeddyChocolateAn: React component running a timed multi-phase teddy-eating-chocolate animation with sound effects and motion overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to the authenticated Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing auth client creation, login flow, identity state, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus extensive OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and custom romantic utility classes, including a background overlay effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, typography, container queries, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, requirements, features, and image assets for the romantic-themed teddy bear chocolate animation app.
